vote.title: Authorize an increase in the purchase price for the acquisition from Timothy L. Nieman, Jr., and Dorothy Nieman of approximately 2,878 square feet of land located in Dallas County for the Southwest 120/96-inch Water Transmission Pipeline Project - Not to exceed $18,000.00, increased from $47,237.00 ($44,237.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $3,000.00) to $65,237.00 ($62,237.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $3,000.00) - Financing: Water Capital Improvement E Fund
